title: Party IP Thoughts
body:
Plenty of people are wondering why Party IP Weekend isn't permanent. The reason is very obvious... but I do have an idea for it. How about keeping a permanent IP boost in parties, but with only small additional IP, for example:
110% for 2 people
115% for 3 people
120% for 4 people
130% for 5 people

Just a thought. So there will still be a benefit of playing in a party.

There will be summoner chests (or whatever they're called) though, we don't really know much of it yet... so let's just see.
